text: وَأَصۡبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَٰرِغًاۖ إِن كَادَتۡ لَتُبۡدِي بِهِۦ لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

translation.en: And the heart of Moses' mother became empty [of all else]. She was about to disclose [the matter concerning] him had We not bound fast her heart that she would be of the believers
translation.id: (Dan hati ibu Musa menjadi kosong.606) Sungguh, hampir saja dia menyatakannya (rahasia tentang Musa), seandainya tidak Kami teguhkan hatinya, agar dia termasuk orang-orang yang beriman (kepada janji Allah)
